title: geth sending incorrect work via RPC
body:
From what I can tell, `geth` is sending incorrect work to via the RPC, when using the latest `develop` at the time of this writing, and sending work to `ethminer`. Here's my `ethminer` output that would suggest incorrect work being passed (check out the zeroed header hash, seed hash, and target). I've included `geth` output below as well:

Forgive me if this is a cpp-ethereum issue. Will move there if so.

**ethminer output**

